name: Killer Clowns
description: Killer Clowns is an electrifying combination of the arcade classic: Berzerk, and the cult classic film: Killer Klowns From Outer Space. With touches of elements from games like Dead Space and Super Smash TV, Killer Clowns is a tough-as-nails arcade experience from outta this world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2.4 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.2 compatible GPU with at least 256MB of VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space Additional Notes: Xbox 360 Controller or Direct Input compatible controller
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2.8 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.2 compatible GPU with at least 512MB of VRAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 300 MB available space Additional Notes: Xbox 360 Controller or Direct Input compatible controller
